sub_title: Alliances & Partners Manager  EMEA at inRiver
summary:
Creative sales & marketing professional with an entrepreneurial spirit and 15+ years of sales, marketing and operations expertise. demonstrated record driving organizational growth by devising  business development initiatives, and building viable business relationships. Customer-focused, highly skilled in sales, client retention and markting.  Specialized background in internet / IT sector. Fluent in Dutch, English and German.

Specialties: Business Development • Strategic Planning • Customer Relations • B2B Pipeline Development • C-Level Relations • Creative Marketing • Operations Management • Marketing • Communications • Strategic Partnerships • internet • Trend / Market Analysis • Presentations 

Episerver personalisation certified

Mobile: +31642520813
